scripts.watch: npm run gmaps:watch & npm run settings:watch
scripts.build: npm run gmaps:build & npm run settings:build
scripts.gmaps:watch: npm run gmaps:watch:scss & npm run gmaps:watch:js
scripts.gmaps:build: npm run gmaps:build:scss & npm run gmaps:build:js
scripts.settings:watch: npm run settings:watch:scss & npm run settings:watch:js
scripts.settings:build: npm run settings:build:scss & npm run settings:build:js
scripts.settings:watch:scss: node-sass inc/settings -o inc/settings/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.i18n:scan: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:po
scripts.i18n:create: npm run i18n:mo & npm run i18n:json
